resources.string: Trying to get a job?\nGet the skills for success here!
Download: The modules in this app are FREE! Download them to access their contents. You can use them offline anytime, anywhere!
Learn: Interactive videos will teach you CV writing, interview skills, communication skills, and more!
In-Person Classes: If you are a government university student or recent graduate you can attend in-person classes at USWDP centers FREE after passing the modules in this app.
